content.rendered:
Timo holds a Bachelor of Business and is working towards obtaining ACCA professional membership with the aim of becoming a fully qualified accountant and auditor. Timo expertise consists of strong government and public practice audit experience including funding reviews across a variety clients in both the commercial and not for profit sectors including schools, further education colleges, academics and universities. This comprised mainly leading financial and compliance statutory audits, performing agreed upon procedures and funding audits on behalf of UK and institutional funding bodies. In Timo’s earlier career history his work mainly involved auditing financial statements for large central government clients and bodies at a local level for senior audit staff.

In addition to having a passion for learning, at Regent group Timo is committed to accomplishing excellence and is determined in helping staff work towards meeting the prescribed requirements to a high standard and improve operations.
